title: David Lammy – 2021 Comments on Crown Court Backlog
author: admin
summary: The comments made by David Lammy, the Shadow Justice Secretary, on 8 April 2021.
content:
The government is letting victims of crime down by allowing the Crown Court backlog to reach more than 57,000 cases for the very first time.
